ListItem.name: nextItem
ListItem.desc: A link to the ListItem that follows the current one.

ListItem.name: position
ListItem.desc: The position of an item in a series or sequence of items.

ListItem.name: previousItem
ListItem.desc: A link to the ListItem that preceeds the current one.

ListItem.name: item
ListItem.desc: An entity represented by an entry in a list or data feed (e.g. an 'artist' in a list of 'artists')’.
